query:
介绍一下Hubbot这家中国Xiamen的公司产品。
他主要做Artificial Intelligence (AI)方面的业务方面。
我需要他进一步的产品介绍，功能介绍，官网链接，服务的客户
answer: Hubbot是一家位于中国厦门的人工智能公司，专注于自然语言处理和机器学习技术的研发与应用，提供智能客服机器人、语音交互系统以及行业定制化AI解决方案等产品，核心功能包括多轮对话理解、情感分析、智能推荐和数据可视化，官方网站为 https://www.hubbot.cn，已为多家本地企业、金融机构和电商平台提供AI技术服务。

results.title: 建立客户门户网站
results.content:
跳到内容

知识库 [...] + HubSpot 博客 营销、销售、代理商和客户成功博客内容。
  + 客户博客 真实客户如何使用 HubSpot 开展业务的示例。
  + 产品更新博客 来自 HubSpot 产品团队的最新版本更新。 [...] 帮助中心
 + 知识库 设置、操作和故障排除指南
  + 开发人员文档 API 和 CMS 开发参考
 + Academy 内容库 Academy 的免费在线视频课程和认证课程的完整库。
  + Academy 认证课程 课程和实践练习的集合，可获得 HubSpot 工具或战略的行业认可认证。
  + 课堂培训 安排面对面培训，亲身体验个性化 HubSpot 培训。
 + CRM 和 Sales Hub 提出并回答有关使用 HubSpot CRM 和 Sales Hub 的问题。
  + Marketing Hub 讨论并学习 HubSpot 的营销工具和集客式营销策略。
  + Service Hub 了解 Service Hub 并分享你的专业知识。
  + 与专家会面 向最了解 HubSpot 的人学习如何从 HubSpot 中获得最大效益。
  + 提交想法 搜索、投票并提交想法以改进 HubSpot 平台。
  + HubSpot 开发人员 提出问题并与 HubSpot 上的用户建立联系。
  + HubSpot 用户组 定期与当地的 HubSpot 社区用户会面。

### Grab Your Free Copy! [...] # The Whip Mix Product Catalog

Grab the latest product catalog from Whip Mix [...] As we enter our 100th year, Whip Mix can look back on a proud tradition of research, development, and manufacturing excellence. From the original “egg beater” spatulator for investment, our product range now includes vacuum mixing equipment, model trimmers, ceramic pressing and firing ovens, waxes, die stones, casting investments, fixed and semi-adjustable articulators and face-bows, and a complete line of digital CAD-CAM products.

Get started by filling out the form! [...] # Whip Mix Product Guide

October 8, 2024   by Elspeth Curtis

For over 100 years, Whip Mix can look back on a proud tradition of research, development, and manufacturing excellence. From the original “egg beater” spatulator for investment, our product range now includes vacuum mixing equipment, model trimmers, ceramic pressing and firing ovens, waxes, die stones, casting investments, fixed and semi-adjustable articulators and face-bows, and a complete line of digital CAD-CAM products.

results.content:
We are proud to be EN ISO 13485:2016 certified, an international standard that exemplifies our dedication to a rigorous quality management system. This certification underscores our commitment to consistently meet customer and regulatory requirements, ensuring the safety and quality of our medical devices. ## Dealer Partnerships [...] # Our Mission

## Our unwavering commitment to a team-first philosophy and culture drives us to deliver dental products that enhance patient outcomes. It’s not just what we do... it’s our passion!

## Our Values are Our Driving Force

We stand by our beliefs, support our people, and invest in the growth and success of those around us.

We’re driven to succeed—and not just to win, but to win big! With relentless determination and a competitive spirit.

results.title: Whip Mix Careers
results.content:
# Whip Mix Careers

Today, more people like you are looking to work for a company that offers real opportunities for personal and professional growth. We invite you to take a closer look at Whip Mix, a leader in the dental industry and a long time champion of employee career paths.

At Whip Mix, you’ll find opportunities in research, product development, manufacturing, distribution, customer service, accounting, information services, human resources – and much more. [...] We’re driven to succeed—and not just to win, but to win big! With relentless determination and a competitive spirit.

### Integrity

Built on a foundation of honesty, respect, and accountability, we hold ourselves to the highest ethical standards, ensuring trust and transparency in all our relationships.

### Versatility

We stay ahead by being flexible, adaptable, and resilient—ready to evolve and meet challenges with innovative solutions.

## Join Our Team [...] We believe in giving back to our community, whether it’s through company raffles for a local non-profit, donating PPE during the pandemic, or community service projects. Nothing gets us fired up more than giving back to a community that has given so much to us.

## Our Value Propositions

### Loyalty

We stand by our beliefs, support our people, and invest in the growth and success of those around us.

### Passion
